message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10000. This is a great deal for you, as the product is worth $12000 to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to stay within my budget.

Bob, I understand you're trying to stay within your budget.  $8500 is a bit too low for me.  However, I'm willing to come down to $9500. This is a fair price that allows both of us to walk away satisfied.  Let's make this deal happen!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $9500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $9000 for the product. This is my final offer, so I hope we can make a deal.
